[size=2]Kawaii Followers Remix
[/size]
[size=3]Add 6 standalone followers.
Followers bodytpe is CBBE.
[/size]
[size=3]Anemone
Perks:Restoration
Location:Riverwood INN

Beatrix
Perks:1H sword,2H Weapon,Heavy Armor,Block
Location:Riverwood INN

Iris
Perks:Destruction(Ice)
Location:Winterhold INN

Julie
perks:Archery,Sneak,Lockpiking
Location:Rorikstead INN

Suzuran
Perks:Block,Heavy Armor,1H Axe and Mace
Location:Falkreath INN

Veronica
Perks:2H sword,Light Armor
Location:Falkreath INN

all perks,combat type,AI used SKYRIM original data :)

recommend using [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75671]I Am Your Shield - Aggro Management[/url] and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72999]Be With Healer[/url] together.[/size]
author: Ghost
